## GraphNode class

Graph scene node

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class GraphNode extends SceneNode 
```
**Extends:** [SceneNode](doc/markdown/./scene.scenenode.md)

## Remarks

Graph node is the base class of any kind of scene node that will be placed into the octree

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(scene)](doc/markdown/./scene.graphnode._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a graph node |
